entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023
